fields.tagline: Query oriented data federation and management system
fields.project_overview:
Project Overview

BioMart is a query-oriented federated data management system developed jointly by the Ontario Institute for Cancer Research (OICR) and the European Bioinformatics Institute (EBI). BioMart is completely open source, licensed under the LGPL, and freely available to anyone without restriction. BioMart uses a federated approach to data management, enabling users to retrieve and integrate data from distributed, independently managed data sources. BioMart has a flexible data model and built-in query optimizations, so that it can be used with a wide range of data types, and is particularly suited for large, descriptive biological datasets. BioMart is preinstalled with a diverse selection of web-based graphical user interfaces (GUIs), and programmatic interfaces (APIs) that can be configured and customized according to user requirements. Because of these features, and its simple, automated installation, BioMart data management system has been adopted by numerous biological databases and international consortia. 

Read more about BioMart>>
